name: donatello - Trello inspired clone
description: Donatello is the flexible work management tool where teams can ideate plans and collaborate on projects. Developed with Vue.js, Vuex, SASS, mongoDB, Express and Socket.io.

name: wazzup
description: Room-based chat app in Whatsapp-Web style. Developed using MERN stack, and pusher service as websockets.

name: email-app
description: Email app client side project with a unique design. Developed with Vue.js, Vuex and SASS

name: memegen
description: Meme generator - Vanilla JS Project, canvas practice. Choose or upload an image, place funny text & emojis over them and download/share your meme with your friends!

name: missbooks
description: Virtual library, finding books and get inspired by famous quotes. Developed using Angular, RxJS and SASS. Running on serverless backend using firebase tools for authentication and storing data.
